entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 p.m. ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 5:36 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure: 98.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: NNW 37 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
